titleStmt.title: An epistle sent by Monsievr de Vrillac, advocate in the Parliament of Paris; to Monsievr de Vrillac his father, vpon the occasion of his conuersion. Faithfully translated into English, accoriding to the French copie; By C.C.
titleStmt.author: Vrillac, Monsieur de.
C. C., fl. 1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. D[awson] for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at the signe of the starre vnder St Peters-Church in Corne-hill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by C.C., of a letter written by Monsier de Vrillac.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the starre vnder St Peters-Church in Corne-hill
